body.name: Premium Quality Over The Sink Stainless Steel Oval Colander with Fine Mesh 6 Quart Strainer Basket & Expandable Rubber Grip Handles - Strain, Drain, Rinse Fruits, Vegetables

byLineInfo.name: Visit the U.S. Kitchen Supply Store

deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 16 hrs 35 mins
features: Professional Grade Mesh Colander Basket: Premium quality high performance over the sink oval stainless steel colander with a fine mesh net strainer basket and expandable rubber grip handles. The colander features sturdy handles that extend from 14" out to 21", which allows it be be used over or in most sinks. It has a mirror finished wide rimmed frame with resting feet on the bottom. The rust-proof firm fine mesh keeps the baskets netting in shape while in use

Helping Hand To Prepare Food: Our oval colander strainer basket can rest over the sink with the handles extended or rest in the sink with the handles collapsed, so that your hands are free for you to focus on other things. This colander allows you to be more efficient in the kitchen, because you'll be able to cook faster, easier and with better results! It's easy to clean and dishwasher safe.

Sift, Strain, Drain And Rinse: Colander has a very large 13" by 9" basket with a 6 quart capacity, and this is the ideal size needed to handle most straining, draining, rinsing, sieving, sifting and filtering tasks. The baskets concave mesh net easily catches and sifts, strains or drains small ingredients. The resting legs also allow it to be set on a counter top and be used as a basket to hold or display fruits and vegetables.

Multiple Uses: Our oval colander basket strainer is great for sifting, filtering and straining out impurities and for breaking up clumps in both wet or dry ingredients. Sift flour, sugar and rice. Use for food preparation like rinsing and washing fruits, vegetables, grains and pastas. Strain thick or thin wet ingredients like sauces, lumpy gravy and soups. Excellent for draining cooked pastas. The uses are unlimited

Our colander strainer basket can rest over a sink, in the sink or on a counter top, so that your hands are free and you can focus on other things. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love this! It makes it so much easier to strain whatever I need -- pasta, beans, even helps to wash veggies. The rubber grips help it to stay put on my sink and I love that it's adjustable. So practical!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this thing! Its convenient and strong. It sits low enough in the sink where I can fill the sink with vinegar water to soak fruits and vegetables, then just keep it in their to rinse them off. The holes are small so noodles and rice don't slip through into the sink and it doesn't stain like conventional plastic strainers would.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great fit over sink & very stable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great colander, just minor tweaking needed.
reviews.reviewText: I love my colander. Perfect for draining over the kitchen sink. It's sturdy, doesn't slide on the sink, looks nice and I like the size (I have yet to overfill it). Only thing that should be improve is an easier way to clean underneath the bottom of the colander (metal rim underneath). Sometimes I have pasta that sometimes gets lodged in there and it can be a challenge at times to get it out. I would buy this again and I wish I got this sooner. Game changer!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This has been amazing for us! So much easier to wash fruits, vegetables, and pasta! Fits well on our sink and is adjustable!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very helpful strainer
reviews.reviewText: This strainer fits across my sink and makes it easy for me to pour into it. I got it to use when i make sweet pickles. It was so easy to use and the wider area made it easier to pour into instead of trying to hit a round strainer sitting at the bottom of the sink. Cleaned up easy and stored easy for me too. I'll not make sweet pickles with out it again. I've also used it when washing potatoes and other veggies and for draining pasta. Very useful!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I use this to strain millet and birdseed to use for mushroom inoculation and it works great and so far it’s help up for the past 6 months and has definitely helped me to up my myco game

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great addition to my kitchen gadgets
reviews.reviewText: Arrived in good condition and looks great. Put it to work draining some pasta and now I will use it to drain slow cooker turkey bones for broth and soup.
Purchased this for my mom. She said it fits in her single sink in her retirement home and over the sink onto the counter. She uses it daily.

reviews.reviewTitle: It's perfect for what I wanted it for.
reviews.reviewText: I love being able to wash my fruit and veg and let it drain while I'm cooking or doing other things in the kitchen. It's very sturdy so it won't fall into the sink.
Everything about it was good except the edge of the mesh is not close enough to the outer trim so what ever you strain gets caught in it had to clean
